inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
| extend osSku = properties.osSku
| extend osName = properties.osName
| extend operatingSystem = iif(isnotnull(osSku), osSku, osName)
| extend agentversion = properties.agentVersion
| extend status = properties.status
	| join kind = leftouter (
		resources
			| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
			| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
			| mv-expand allnics= parse_json(properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaces)
			| mv-expand allips = allnics.ipAddresses
			| extend ipAddressVersion = tostring(allips.ipAddressVersion)
			| extend ipAddress = allips.address
			| project  id, ipAddress, ipAddressVersion
			| where  ipAddressVersion =~ "IPv4"
			| summarize ipAddressIPv4 = make_set(ipAddress) by id
		) on id
| project MachineName=name,id,status,ipAddressIPv4, agentversion,operatingSystem, location, resourceGroup, subscriptionId
| sort by (tolower(tostring(MachineName))) asc

partHeader.title: Linux Azure Arc Agent Overview
partHeader.subtitle: Overview of the Arc agents installed and current status.

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
| summarize count() by tostring(properties.agentVersion)
| order by properties_agentVersion desc

partHeader.title: Azure Arc Agent Version Count
partHeader.subtitle: A view and count of the Arc agent versions currently installed.

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Run query to see results.
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
| extend operatingSystem = properties.osSku
| extend logicalCoreCount = properties.detectedProperties.logicalCoreCount 
| extend isVirtual = iff(properties.detectedProperties.model contains "virtual" or properties.detectedProperties.manufacturer in ("VMware, Inc.","Nutanix","Alibaba Cloud")  or properties.cloudMetadata.provider in ( "AWS","GCP"), "Virtual", "Physical")
| extend SysManufacturer = tostring(properties.detectedProperties.manufacturer)
| summarize ArcServers=count(), ServersCores=sum(toint(logicalCoreCount)) by tostring(operatingSystem),SysManufacturer, isVirtual
| sort by tostring(operatingSystem) asc ,SysManufacturer asc, isVirtual asc

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
| extend osSku = properties.osSku
| project name, osSku
| summarize count() by tostring(osSku)
| order by tostring(osSku) asc

partHeader.title: Operating System Count
partHeader.subtitle: A count of the operating systems with an Arc agent installed.

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Run query to see results.
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines' 
| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
| extend machineId = tolower(tostring(id))
| extend hostId = tolower(id)
| extend status = properties.status
| extend osSku = properties.osSku
| extend osName = properties.osName
| extend operatingSystem = iif(isnotnull(osSku), osSku, osName)
| extend extensionsEnabled = tostring(properties.agentConfiguration.extensionsEnabled)
| extend licenseProfile = properties.licenseProfile
| extend licenseStatus = tostring(licenseProfile.licenseStatus)
| extend licenseChannel = tostring(licenseProfile.licenseChannel)
| extend productSubscriptionStatus = tostring(licenseProfile.productProfile.subscriptionStatus)
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions"
    | extend machineId = tolower(tostring(trim_end(@"\/\w+\/(\w|\.)+", id)))
    | extend provisioned = tolower(tostring(properties.provisioningState)) == "succeeded"
    | summarize
        MDEcnt = countif(properties.type in ("MDE.Linux", "MDE.Windows") and provisioned),
        AMAcnt = countif(properties.type in ("AzureMonitorWindowsAgent", "AzureMonitorLinuxAgent") and provisioned),
        UMcnt = countif(properties.type in ("WindowsOsUpdateExtension","LinuxOsUpdateExtension", "WindowsPatchExtension") and provisioned) by machineId
) on machineId
	| join kind = leftouter (
		resources
			| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
			| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
			| mv-expand allnics= parse_json(properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaces)
			| mv-expand allips = allnics.ipAddresses
			| extend ipAddressVersion = tostring(allips.ipAddressVersion)
			| extend ipAddress = allips.address
			| project  id, ipAddress, ipAddressVersion
			| where  ipAddressVersion =~ "IPv4"
			| summarize ipAddressIPv4 = make_set(ipAddress) by id
		) on id
| extend defenderStatus = iff ((MDEcnt>0), 'Enabled', 'Not enabled')
| extend monitoringAgent = iff ((AMAcnt>0), 'Installed','Not installed')
| extend updateManagement = iff ((UMcnt>0), 'Enabled', 'Not enabled')
| extend hostName = tostring(properties.displayName)
| extend name = iif(properties.cloudMetadata.provider == 'AWS' and name != hostName, strcat(name, "(", hostName, ")"), name)
| project MachineName=name,id, status,ipAddressIPv4, operatingSystem, extensionsEnabled, defenderStatus, monitoringAgent, updateManagement, resourceGroup
| sort by (tolower(tostring(MachineName))) asc

partHeader.title: Linux Servers Azure Arc Extension Status
partHeader.subtitle: Overview if extensions are allowed to be deployed to Azure Arc agents and if they are enabled/installed.

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
| extend status = tostring(properties.status)
| extend operatingSystem = tostring(properties.osSku)
| extend isVirtual = iff(properties.detectedProperties.model contains "virtual" or properties.detectedProperties.manufacturer in ("VMware, Inc.","Nutanix","Alibaba Cloud")  or properties.cloudMetadata.provider in ( "AWS","GCP"), "Virtual", "Physical")
| extend SysManufacturer = tostring(properties.detectedProperties.manufacturer)
| project id, JoinID = toupper(id), status,operatingSystem, isVirtual, SysManufacturer
| join kind=leftouter(
  resources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions'
  | where name contains "linux" or name contains "defender"
  | extend provisioningState =  tostring(properties.provisioningState)
  | extend ExtVersion =tostring(properties.typeHandlerVersion)
  | project MachineId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),  ExtensionName =strcat(name, " : ", provisioningState," : ", ExtVersion)
) on $left.JoinID == $right.MachineId
	| join kind = leftouter (
		resources
			| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
			| where properties.osType !contains 'windows'
			| mv-expand allnics= parse_json(properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaces)
			| mv-expand allips = allnics.ipAddresses
			| extend ipAddressVersion = tostring(allips.ipAddressVersion)
			| extend ipAddress = allips.address
			| project  id, ipAddress, ipAddressVersion
			| where  ipAddressVersion =~ "IPv4"
			| summarize ipAddressIPv4 = make_set(ipAddress) by id
		) on id
| summarize Extensions = make_set(ExtensionName) by id,status,tostring(ipAddressIPv4), operatingSystem, isVirtual,SysManufacturer
//| where Extensions  contains "sql"
//| where status  in ( "Connected","" )
//| where Extensions contains "Creating"
| order by tolower(id) asc
